meeting_request.purpose: Feeling overwhelmed by my Philosophy course and uncertain about my future after college
meeting_request.description: Hi, my name is Joseph and I'm a first-year student in Philosophy. This is my first semester in college, and I’m really struggling with the course material. Some of the topics are really complex and I’m not sure I understand everything yet. I’m also feeling really anxious about what I’m learning and what I’ll be expected to do in college. I’m in a major that I’m not really passionate about, and I’m not sure if Philosophy is the right fit for me. I feel like I’m not doing well academically and I’m worried I’ll fail the course and feel like I’m falling behind.
